title: For Cause & for Country: A Study of the Affair At Spring Hill & the Battle of Franklin
description: American history buffs and Civil War enthusiasts will delight in this well-written exploration of one of the bloodiest and most costly campaigns of the Civil War. For Cause & For Country revisits the battles of Spring Hill and Franklin, using previously untapped resources to shed an entirely different light on those dark and difficult days.
author: Eric A. Jacobson
